description:
Abagore n’abakobwa bari mu mihango bagomba kugira isuku ku mubiri, ku myenda
y’imbere no ku bikoresho by’isuku. Ningombwa guteganya ahantu hiherereye kugira 
ngo bashobora kwisukura nta nkomyi.
title: Abagore n’abakobwa bari mu mihango bagomba kugira isuku ku mubiri, ku myenda y’imbere no ku bikoresho by’isuku. Ningombwa guteganya ahantu hiherereye kugira ngo bashobora kwisukura nta nkomyi.
content:
Abagore n’abakobwa bari mu mihango bagomba kugira isuku ku mubiri, ku myenda
y’imbere no ku bikoresho by’isuku. Ningombwa guteganya ahantu hiherereye kugira 
ngo bashobora kwisukura nta nkomyi.
